sourcesContent:
import React, { useState } from 'react'; import '../styles/Destinations.css'; import guangzhou from '../assets/广州.jpg'; const destinations = [ { id: 1, name: '北京', image: 'https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1508804185872-d7badad00f7d', description: '探索中国历史文化的心脏', attractions: ['故宫', '长城', '天坛', '颐和园'], price: '¥3000起', details: { duration: '4天3晚', includes: ['五星级酒店住宿', '专业导游服务', '景点门票', '往返交通'], schedule: [ { day: '第一天', activities: ['接机', '入住酒店', '天安门广场夜景'] }, { day: '第二天', activities: ['故宫博物院', '景山公园', '什刹海'] }, { day: '第三天', activities: ['八达岭长城', '鸟巢水立方', '王府井'] }, { day: '第四天', activities: ['天坛公园', '送机'] } ], notes: ['请提前3天预订', '可定制行程', '含早餐'] } }, { id: 2, name: '上海', image: 'https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1548919973-5cef591cdbc9', description: '感受现代都市的繁华魅力', attractions: ['外滩', '东方明珠', '豫园', '迪士尼'], price: '¥2800起' }, { id: 3, name: '广州', image: guangzhou, description: '品味岭南文化的独特韵味', attractions: ['陈家祠', '沙面', '白云山', '广州塔'], price: '¥2500起' } ]; function Destinations() { const [selectedDestination, setSelectedDestination] = useState(null); const [showBookingForm, setShowBookingForm] = useState(false); const [bookingData, setBookingData] = useState({ name: '', phone: '', email: '', date: '', adults: 1, children: 0, notes: '' }); const handleBookingSubmit = (e) => { e.preventDefault(); // 这里添加预订提交逻辑 console.log('预订信息：', { destination: selectedDestination.name, ...bookingData }); alert('预订成功！我们的客服会尽快联系您。'); setShowBookingForm(false); setBookingData({ name: '', phone: '', email: '', date: '', adults: 1, children: 0, notes: '' }); }; return (

探索目的地

发现令人惊叹的旅游胜地

{destinations.map(destination => (

{destination.name}

{destination.description}

{destination.price}
))}
{selectedDestination && (
setSelectedDestination(null)}>
e.stopPropagation()}>

{selectedDestination.name}

{selectedDestination.description}

行程详情

行程天数：{selectedDestination.details.duration}

费用包含：

    {selectedDestination.details.includes.map((item, index) => (
  • {item}
    • ))}

行程安排：

{selectedDestination.details.schedule.map((day, index) => (
{day.day}
    {day.activities.map((activity, idx) => (
  • {activity}
    • ))}
))}

注意事项：

    {selectedDestination.details.notes.map((note, index) => (
  • {note}
    • ))}
{selectedDestination.price}
)} {showBookingForm && (
setShowBookingForm(false)}>
e.stopPropagation()}>

预订信息

setBookingData({...bookingData, name: e.target.value})} />
setBookingData({...bookingData, phone: e.target.value})} />
setBookingData({...bookingData, email: e.target.value})} />
setBookingData({...bookingData, date: e.target.value})} />
setBookingData({...bookingData, adults: e.target.value})} />
setBookingData({...bookingData, children: e.target.value})} />
